message.body:
Fun fact: $TSLA  will have to fill that gap. its a ridiculous gap up too. Just because they sold a little bit more cars than expected. Has anyone seen how many cars Volkswagen sells? Tesla is the hedgefund`s meme stock.  Its not selling enough cars to justify this crazy valuation.  Once again this is the FED`s fault for not raising interest rates. $AAPL  is at a absolutely bubble market cap of 3 trillion dollars. That is 13% of the entire USA`s GDP. No company should be that worthy. Another way to think of it $AAPL is worth 1/10th of the USA.  
 
This type of thing can lead to dystopian futures where the evil corporations become the government and enslave the people. it is getting out of hand now.

$AAPL it’s been 5 days since contracting covid, and I still feel like ass. Best go back to work and give it to eerbody 🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️

$MSFT the only reason we sold off in first few hours was deferred tax lot selling and locking gains by those who did not want to sell last week as it would have added to their taxable income. For sure there is lot of volatility ahead and rotation a top priority for portfolio managers…I believe it is a standard textbook rule in wall street - deferred selling in those stocks which gave maximum gains the previous years … none the less I am sticking with the best $aapl and msft! Deferred selling was observed in many stocks like Nike and others..
